functionDecorators.name: crvToUsd
functionDecorators.description: converts from CRV with 18 decimals to USD with 18 decimals.

functionDecorators.name: getLatestPrice
functionDecorators.description: return the lastest price for CRV/USD with 18 decimals places.

functionDecorators.name: usdToCrv
functionDecorators.description: converts from USD with 18 decimals to CRV with 18 decimals.
